page.title: 15FRANCE LYNCH NEAR CHALFORD
page.content: Half of this area is covered by farmland,growing wheat and rape,and about one eighth by deciduous trees. The rest is mainly old Cotswold stone dwelling houses plus a few modern ones. Chalford Hill School sports field is here,next door to the Sports and Social Club.There are many activities available at the club like cricket,football and tennis.In the main hall they hold wedding receptions and dances and you can also play table tennis. There is also the France Lynch Church Hall where many of the village clubs like Brownies and The Womens' Institute meet.Other amenities are the village pub,the Post Office and the pleasure ground which has swings,a slide and a football pitch.
